S.FORM: Kari(Kari Tlu: ) ka, qyqeya ddoyan seediq rmengo ma empprngaw. Uka patis ka tikuh kari, asi Ka naq rudan ini chungi kari ge, maha mkela smneeru kari so pnsltudan rudan. Kari ni u ida hniti na rdrudan, asi ka bliqun smku ni ltudun ka dni, iya balay chngii. kari Taywang niqan mndungus bay knou kluwan Kari Nantaw Yusi, kari Tlu mi kari Holo mi kari Hakka mi pnbawa Taywang pskari uri, kana niyi pa mbtunux bay cucan kari Taiwan kana. Papak Patis pnyahan World Atlas of Language Structures Ethnologue: Languages of the World .
